test.name: TC01_001 compound List

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: DESCRIPTION: Check duplicate items from list A and list B and append to a new list. Using your preferred programming language.

test.name: TC02_001 Login success

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${Message} = You logged into a secure area! ×
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element '//div[@id="flash"]' contains exact text 'You logged into a secure area! ×'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: DESCRIPTION: To verify that users can login successfully when input a correct username and password. Test Step "1. Open browser and go to'http://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login'. 2. Input username'tomsmith' and password'SuperSecretPassword!'. 3. Click the 'Logout' button. Expected Result 1. Login page is shown. 2. Login success and message 'You logged into asecure area!' is shown. 3. Go back to the Loginpage and the message ' Youlogged out of the securearea!' is shown.

test.name: TC02_002 Login failed-Password incorrect

test.doc: DESCRIPTION: To verify that users can login unsuccessfully when they input a correct username but wrong password. Test Step "1. Open browser and go to'http://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login'. 2. Input username'tomsmith' and password'Password!'. Expected Result 1. Login page is shown. 2. Login failed and the message 'Your password is invalid!' is shown.

test.doc: To verify that users can login unsuccessfully when they input a username that did not exist. Test Step 1. Open browser and go to'http://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login'. 2. Input username'tomholland' and password 'Password!'. Expected Result 1. Login page is shown. 2. Login failed and the message 'Your username is invalid!' is shown.

test.name: TC03_001 Get user profile success

kw.name: Get
kw.doc: Sends a GET request.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: To verify get user profile api will return correct data when trying to get profile of existing user Test Step 1. Send Get request to url https://reqres.in/api/users/12 Expected Result 1. Verify response status code should be ‘200’ 2. Compare the response body with expected below. ‘ID’ == 12 ‘Email’ == rachel.howell@reqres.in ‘First Name’ == Rachel ‘Last Name’ == Howell ‘Avatar’ ==https://reqres.in/img/faces/12-image.jpg
